body_html:
@allenlavoie Thank you for your response. For #21460, the bug is from loading weights. For this one, if I enable "get_config()", the crash happened during save_weights(). Therefore, I submitted this new issue.

I do not quite understand the issue. Do you mean that I cannot use get_config() for my custom layer? However, I see some online discussions claiming they use "get_config()" without any issues. Did I use it wrong? Thank you.
body_text:
@allenlavoie Thank you for your response. For #21460, the bug is from loading weights. For this one, if I enable "get_config()", the crash happened during save_weights(). Therefore, I submitted this new issue.
I do not quite understand the issue. Do you mean that I cannot use get_config() for my custom layer? However, I see some online discussions claiming they use "get_config()" without any issues. Did I use it wrong? Thank you.
body:
@allenlavoie Thank you for your response. For #21460, the bug is from loading weights. For this one, if I enable "get_config()", the crash happened during save_weights(). Therefore, I submitted this new issue. 

I do not quite understand the issue. Do you mean that I cannot use get_config() for my custom layer? However, I see some online discussions claiming they use "get_config()" without any issues. Did I use it wrong? Thank you.
